metadata.name: Greens
metadata.description:
Green has so many meanings that I could not put it into words....
In the exterior there is always gray, although sometimes I miss the green quite a lot.
Maybe that's why I feel a bit nostalgic about this painting, the lack of green is a lack of faith, illusion, and life.
If the shadows are dyed green, maybe the shadows will lose the negativity with which we associate them.

Ballpoint pen and goauche on paper.
